children.name: Introduction

blocks.text: When aiming to transform and improve your processes, it can help you to understand exactly what transaction codes you’re currently using for certain processes and process steps. This can be important as part of an SAP S/4HANA transformation, for example. You might also want to know to what extent you’re using standard transactions and for which process steps you’re using custom transactions. This information is useful if you intend to reduce the use of custom transactions in SAP S/4HANA. It’s especially important if you aim to start your transformation journey towards SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition, where such custom transactions aren’t supported.

Analyzing the transactions that you're using in your processes can help you identify harmonization potential – both within and across entities. If a range of different transactions are being used for the same process step, this indicates a need to further streamline your way of working.

You can also use the following analyses to assess whether you're using the recommended and standard SAP transactions intended to be used for the process steps. In combination with other information, this can help you to identify root causes of low Best-Run Scores.

The following analysis provides an overview of the transaction codes that are used for this process flow variant, including custom transaction usage. It allows you to understand to what extent the use of transaction codes is harmonized for process steps and to drill down into further details.

children.name: 01. Overview
How to use

blocks.text: The following section provides a first overview of how many transaction codes are used on average for each process step. Harmonizing the use of transaction codes for a specific process step can make processes more efficient, reduce onboarding and training efforts, and simplify reporting. You also see what proportion of the transactions used in the process relates to custom transactions. If a significant number of activities are completed using custom transactions, you might want to check whether standard transaction codes can be used instead. Using standard transaction codes empowers you to lower total cost of ownership and prepare for your SAP S/4HANA transformation.

children.name: Transaction code usage per process step

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	"Process step",
    "KPI name",
    "# Cases"
FROM
(
SELECT 
    "Process step",
    'AVG number of TCODEs per step' AS "KPI name",
    AVG("Transaction code") AS "# Cases",
	"New Order"
FROM
(
SELECT
	'Invoice creation' AS "Process step",
    COUNT( DISTINCT "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)") AS "Transaction code",
	1 AS "New Order"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	'Invoice release' AS "Process step",
	COUNT( DISTINCT "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)")
    FILTER (
    WHERE "6 - Other - Prev. blocked (PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    AND "6 - Other - Release Date (UDATE_RELEASE)" IS NOT NULL) AS "Transaction code",
	2 AS "New Order"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
UNION ALL
SELECT
	'Invoice clearing' AS "Process step",
    COUNT( DISTINCT "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)") AS "Transaction code",
	3 AS "New Order"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
) AS temp

UNION ALL
--Custom
SELECT 
    "Process step",
    'AVG number of custom TCODEs used' AS "KPI name",
    AVG("Custom transaction code") AS "# Cases",
	"New Order"
FROM
(
SELECT
	'Invoice clearing' AS "Process step",
    COUNT( DISTINCT CASE WHEN 
    "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE 'Z%'
    OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE 'Y%'
    OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE '/%'
    THEN "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" ELSE null END ) AS "Custom transaction code",
	3 AS "New Order"
    FROM THIS_PROCESS
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	'Invoice release' AS "Process step",
    COUNT( DISTINCT CASE WHEN 
    "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Z%'
    OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Y%'
    OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE '/%'
    THEN "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" ELSE null END ) AS "Custom transaction code",
	2 AS "New Order"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
UNION ALL
SELECT
	'Invoice creation' AS "Process step",
    COUNT( DISTINCT CASE WHEN
       "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
      OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
      OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
    THEN "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" 
    ELSE null END ) AS "Custom transaction code",
	1 AS "New Order"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
) AS temp
ORDER BY 4 ASC
) AS temp2

children.name: Percentage of standard transaction usage
children.description: The metric describes the ratio of cases, which are executed using only standard transactions and no custom transactions (Z* or Y* or /*)

dataSource.query:
SELECT  
    100 - COUNT( 
    	CASE WHEN "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE 'Z%'
            OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE 'Y%'
            OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE '/%'
            OR (("6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Z%'
    		OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Y%'
    		OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE '/%')
    		AND "6 - Other - Prev. blocked (PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    		AND "6 - Other - Release Date (UDATE_RELEASE)" IS NOT NULL)
            OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
            OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
            OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
    	THEN case_id 
        ELSE NULL END ) 
    / 
    COUNT(case_id) * 100 AS "Percentage of standard transaction codes"

FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG number of transaction codes used per step
children.description: AVG number of transaction codes used per step

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG("Transaction code") AS "AVG number of TCODEs per step"
FROM (
    SELECT
        'Invoice creation' AS "Process step",
        COUNT( DISTINCT "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)") 
        	AS "Transaction code",
        COUNT( DISTINCT 
        	CASE WHEN "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
              OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
              OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
        	  THEN "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" 
        	ELSE NULL END
        ) AS "Custom transaction code"
    FROM THIS_PROCESS
	
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
        'Invoice release' AS "Process step",
    	COUNT( DISTINCT "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)")
    	FILTER ( WHERE
    			"6 - Other - Prev. blocked (PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    			AND "6 - Other - Release Date (UDATE_RELEASE)" IS NOT NULL) AS "Transaction code",
   	 	COUNT( DISTINCT CASE WHEN 
    		("6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Z%'
    		OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Y%'
    		OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE '/%')
    		AND "6 - Other - Prev. blocked (PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    		AND "6 - Other - Release Date (UDATE_RELEASE)" IS NOT NULL
    		THEN "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" ELSE null END ) AS "Custom transaction code"
    FROM THIS_PROCESS
    UNION ALL
    SELECT
        'Invoice clearing' AS "Process step",
        COUNT( DISTINCT "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)") 
        	AS "Transaction code",
        COUNT( DISTINCT 
        	CASE WHEN "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE 'Z%'
              OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE 'Y%'
              OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE '/%'
        	  THEN "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" 
            ELSE NULL END 
        ) AS "Custom transaction code"
    FROM THIS_PROCESS
) AS temp

children.name: Total number of cases
Total number of cases using custom transaction codes
children.description: Total number of cases using custom transaction codes

dataSource.query:
SELECT  
	COUNT ( CASE WHEN 
		"6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)"  LIKE 'Z%'
		OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)"  LIKE 'Y%'
		OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)"  LIKE '/%'
		THEN case_id  ELSE NULL END )
	+
	COUNT ( CASE WHEN 
		("6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)"   LIKE 'Z%'
		OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)"  LIKE 'Y%'
		OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)"  LIKE '/%')
        AND "6 - Other - Prev. blocked (PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    	AND "6 - Other - Release Date (UDATE_RELEASE)" IS NOT NULL
		THEN case_id ELSE NULL END )
	+
	COUNT ( CASE WHEN 
		"1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)"   LIKE 'Z%'
		OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)"   LIKE 'Y%'
		OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)"   LIKE '/%'
		THEN case_id ELSE NULL END )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG cycle time

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG(
		(SELECT LAST(end_time))
		-
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time)))
	AS "AVG cycle time"
FROM
THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG cycle time using custom transaction codes
children.description: AVG Cycle time using at least one custom transaction code in the process

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG(
		(SELECT LAST(end_time))
		-
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time))) 
	FILTER (
    	WHERE CASE WHEN "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE 'Z%'
          OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE 'Y%'
          OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE '/%'
          OR (("6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Z%'
	      OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Y%'
	      OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE '/%')
          AND "6 - Other - Prev. blocked (PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    	  AND "6 - Other - Release Date (UDATE_RELEASE)" IS NOT NULL)
          OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
          OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
          OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
	    THEN case_id ELSE NULL END IS NOT NULL)
	AS "AVG cycle time"
FROM
THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Further analysis

blocks.text: The following sections provide more details on the transaction codes used across organizational units. This analysis helps you to understand in which organizational units work is most or least harmonized. You can identify organizational units in which use of custom transactions is more widespread for a certain process step. These insights are useful in highlighting your organization’s best and worst practices. This information can serve as a basis for defining your target processes. Comparing the use of transaction codes across organizational units running a similar business can also serve as a starting point for discussing root causes and potentially agreeing on a common target process. If you want to avoid using certain transaction codes in the future, this analysis can help you to identify where use of these transaction codes is currently most widespread. This allows you to address pending changes in how these units work in a systematic way. Avoiding the use of custom transaction codes is a key aspect to consider, for example, where they’re no longer supported with SAP S/4HANA and have been replaced by alternative options.
Note: When transaction codes are shown as "null", this can indicate that the program was triggered by background processing.

children.name: 02. Invoice creation
Invoice creation

blocks.text: Invoice creation marks the point in time when the supplier invoice is entered into the system. For invoices created in Financials, this is typically done using transaction FB60.

children.name: Top 10 transaction codes used for invoice creation by company code

dataSource.query:
SELECT "# Cases", 
		"Transaction code", 
        "Company code"
FROM (
       SELECT 
         DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY "Sum" DESC) as "DENSE_RANK",
         "# Cases", 
         "Transaction code", 
         "Company code",
         "Sum"
       FROM (
       SELECT  COUNT("case_id") AS "# Cases", 
         "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" AS "Transaction code", 
         "1 - Main - Company Code (BUKRS)" AS "Company code" ,
         SUM (COUNT (CASE_ID)) OVER (PARTITION BY "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)") as "Sum"
		FROM THIS_PROCESS 
		WHERE "6 - Other - Clearing Entry Date (CPUDT_AUGBL)" IS NOT NULL
			AND "6 - Other - Document Status (BSTAT)" IS NULL) AS SUB
    ) AS Sub
WHERE "DENSE_RANK" <=10
ORDER BY 1 DESC

children.name: Percentage of standard transaction codes used for invoice creation
children.description: The metric describes the ratio of cases, for which this process step has been executed using only standard transactions and no custom transactions (Z* or Y* or /*)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	100 - COUNT( 
    	CASE WHEN "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
		  OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
          OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
		  THEN case_id 
        ELSE null END ) 
    / COUNT(case_id)
		* 100 as "Rate"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "6 - Other - Clearing Entry Date (CPUDT_AUGBL)" IS NOT NULL
	AND "6 - Other - Document Status (BSTAT)" IS NULL

children.name: Total number of cases using custom transaction codes

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT( CASE WHEN "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
      OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
      OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
	  THEN case_id 
    ELSE NULL END ) AS "# Custom transaction codes"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG cycle time

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG(
		(SELECT LAST(end_time))
		-
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time)))
	AS "AVG cycle time"
FROM
THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG cycle time using custom transaction codes in invoice creation
children.description: AVG cycle time using custom transaction codes in the process step

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG(
		(SELECT LAST(end_time))
		-
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time))) 
	FILTER ( WHERE CASE WHEN "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
          OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
          OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
	      THEN case_id 
        ELSE null END IS NOT NULL)
	AS "AVG cycle time"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Transaction code usage details: Invoice creation

columnConfigurations.columnName: AVG(2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices issued before purchase order) * 100
AVG(2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices created after posting date) * 100
columnConfigurations.columnAlias: Supplier invoices created after posting date

columnConfigurations.columnName: AVG(2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices previously parked) * 100
AVG(3 - Info - Supplier invoices created for internal trading partners) * 100

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	"1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" AS "Transaction code",
	COUNT("case_id") AS "# Cases",
	AVG(
			(SELECT LAST(end_time))
			-
			(SELECT FIRST(end_time)))
		AS "AVG cycle time",
    AVG("3 - Info - Supplier invoices created for internal trading partners" ) * 100 
    	AS "Intercompany invoices (%)",
    AVG("2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices created after posting date") * 100 
    	AS "Supplier invoices created after posting date (%)",
    COUNT(DISTINCT "6 - Other - User Name (USNAM)" ) AS "# Users"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "6 - Other - Clearing Entry Date (CPUDT_AUGBL)" IS NOT NULL
	AND "6 - Other - Document Status (BSTAT)" IS NULL

children.name: Ratio of custom transaction codes used for invoice creation by company code

dataSource.query:
SELECT  "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes",
		"# Cases",
        "Company code"
    FROM
    (SELECT
		COUNT(case_id) as "# Cases", 
		COUNT( CASE WHEN 
    				"1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Z%'
    				OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE 'Y%'
    				OR "1 - Main - Transaction Code (TCODE)" LIKE '/%'
    				THEN case_id ELSE null END )
    			    /
    				COUNT(case_id) * 100 as "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes",
		"1 - Main - Company Code (BUKRS)" AS "Company code"
	
	FROM THIS_PROCESS
    ) AS temp
WHERE "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: 03. Invoice release
Invoice release

blocks.text: Supplier invoices might be blocked for payment due to various reasons - either per default, due to certain predefined thresholds or e.g. due to partial goods receipt or quality issues. As soon as the reasons for the blocking are resolved, the supplier invoice is released for payment. This can be done automatically for invoices blocked via logistics invoice verification as soon as the blocking reasons do not apply any longer. Making sure the invoice block is removed when the blocking reason is resolved is crucial to avoid late supplier payments.

children.name: Top 10 transaction codes used for invoice release by company code

dataSource.query:
SELECT "# Cases", 
		"Transaction code", 
        "Company code"
FROM (
       SELECT 
         DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY "Sum" DESC) as "DENSE_RANK",
         "# Cases", 
         "Transaction code", 
         "Company code",
         "Sum"
       FROM (
       SELECT  COUNT("case_id") AS "# Cases", 
         "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" AS "Transaction code", 
         "1 - Main - Company Code (BUKRS)" AS "Company code" ,
         SUM (COUNT (CASE_ID)) OVER (PARTITION BY "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" ) as "Sum"
		FROM THIS_PROCESS
		WHERE "6 - Other - Prev. blocked (PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
          AND "6 - Other - Release Date (UDATE_RELEASE)" IS NOT NULL
          AND "6 - Other - Pymt Block (ZLSPR)" IS NULL
          AND "6 - Other - Reversed With (STBLG)" IS NULL) AS SUB
    ) AS Sub
WHERE "DENSE_RANK" <=10
ORDER BY 1 DESC

children.name: Percentage of standard transaction codes used for invoice release
children.description: The metric describes the ratio of cases, for which this process step has been executed using only standard transactions and no custom transactions (Z* or Y* or /*)

dataSource.query:
select 
	100 - COUNT( CASE WHEN 
	"6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Z%'
	OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Y%'
	OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE '/%'
	THEN case_id ELSE null END )
	/
	COUNT(case_id)* 100 AS "Rate"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
	"6 - Other - Prev. blocked (PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    AND "6 - Other - Release Date (UDATE_RELEASE)" IS NOT NULL
	AND "6 - Other - Pymt Block (ZLSPR)" IS NULL
	AND "6 - Other - Reversed With (STBLG)" IS NULL

	"6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Z%'
	OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Y%'
	OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE '/%'
	THEN case_id ELSE null END ) AS "# Custom transaction codes"

WHERE	
	"6 - Other - Prev. blocked (PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    AND "6 - Other - Release Date (UDATE_RELEASE)" IS NOT NULL

THIS_PROCESS

	"6 - Other - Prev. blocked (PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    AND "6 - Other - Release Date (UDATE_RELEASE)" IS NOT NULL

children.description: AVG cycle time using custom transaction codes in the process step

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG(
		(SELECT LAST(end_time))
		-
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time))) 
	FILTER 
	(WHERE CASE WHEN 
	    "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Z%'
	    OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Y%'
	    OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE '/%'
	    THEN case_id ELSE null END IS NOT NULL)
	AS "AVG Cycle Time"
FROM
THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
	"6 - Other - Prev. blocked (PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    AND "6 - Other - Release Date (UDATE_RELEASE)" IS NOT NULL

children.name: Transaction code usage details: Invoice release

columnConfigurations.columnName: AVG(2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices blocked for payment in invoice verification but released in FI-AP) * 100
columnConfigurations.columnAlias: Blocked in inv. verification but releasesed in FI-AP

dataSource.query:
SELECT
	"6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" AS "Transaction code",
	COUNT("case_id") AS "# Cases",
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time))
		- (SELECT FIRST(end_time)))
	AS "AVG Cycle Time",
    COUNT( DISTINCT "6 - Other - Released by (USERNAME_RELEASE)" ) 
    	AS "# Users"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
    WHERE "6 - Other - Prev. blocked (PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    AND "6 - Other - Release Date (UDATE_RELEASE)" IS NOT NULL
	AND "6 - Other - Pymt Block (ZLSPR)" IS NULL
	AND "6 - Other - Reversed With (STBLG)" IS NULL

children.name: Ratio of custom transaction codes used for invoice release by company code

dataSource.query:
SELECT
	"Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes",
	"# Cases",
    "Company code"
    FROM
    (SELECT
		COUNT(case_id) as "# Cases", 
		COUNT( 
        	CASE WHEN "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Z%'
    			OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE 'Y%'
    			OR "6 - Other - Release TCode (TCODE_RELEASE)" LIKE '/%'
    		THEN case_id 
            ELSE null END)
    		/ COUNT(case_id) * 100 as "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes",
		"1 - Main - Company Code (BUKRS)" AS "Company code"
	
	FROM THIS_PROCESS
    WHERE "6 - Other - Prev. blocked (PREV_BLOCKED)" IS NOT NULL
    AND "6 - Other - Release Date (UDATE_RELEASE)" IS NOT NULL
    ) AS temp
WHERE "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: 04. Invoice clearing
Invoice clearing

blocks.text: The supplier invoice is considered cleared as soon as the payment to the supplier has been made. SAP recommends to use the automatic payment run to make sure suppliers are paid in time (but not too early) while at the same time considering potential discounts. Manual clearing might be used in some cases for supplier invoices exceeding certain thresholds.

children.name: Top 10 transaction codes used for invoice clearing by company code

dataSource.query:
SELECT "# of Cases", 
		"Transaction Code", 
        "Company Code"
FROM (
       SELECT 
         DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY "sum" DESC) as "DENSE_RANK",
         "# of Cases", 
         "Transaction Code", 
         "Company Code",
         "sum"
       FROM (
       SELECT  COUNT("case_id") AS "# of Cases", 
         "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" AS "Transaction Code", 
         "1 - Main - Company Code (BUKRS)" AS "Company Code",
         SUM (COUNT (CASE_ID)) OVER (PARTITION BY "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" ) as "sum"
        	FROM THIS_PROCESS
			WHERE "6 - Other - Clearing Entry Date (CPUDT_AUGBL)" IS NOT NULL 
				AND "6 - Other - Reversed With (STBLG)" IS NULL) AS SUB
    ) AS Sub
WHERE "DENSE_RANK" <=10
ORDER BY 1 DESC

children.name: Percentage of standard transaction codes used for invoice clearing
children.description: The metric describes the ratio of cases, for which this process step has been executed using only standard transactions and no custom transactions (Z* or Y* or /*)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	100 - COUNT( CASE WHEN "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE 'Z%'
		OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)"  LIKE 'Y%'
        OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE '/%'
		THEN case_id 
      ELSE NULL END )
	/ COUNT(case_id)* 100 as "Rate"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "6 - Other - Clearing Entry Date (CPUDT_AUGBL)" IS NOT NULL 
	AND "6 - Other - Reversed With (STBLG)" IS NULL

children.description: Total number of cases using custom transaction codes

	OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE '/%'
	THEN case_id ELSE null END ) AS "# Custom transaction codes"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

		(SELECT LAST(end_time))
		-
		(SELECT FIRST(end_time)))
	AS "AVG cycle time"

THIS_PROCESS

	    OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE 'Y%'
	    OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE '/%'
	    THEN case_id ELSE null END IS NOT NULL)

THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Transaction code usage details: Invoice clearing

columnConfigurations.columnName: AVG(2 - Blocker - FI-AP items cleared more than 3 days before net due date and no discount) * 100
AVG(2 - Blocker - FI-AP items cleared after net due date) * 100
AVG(2 - Blocker - FI-AP items cleared more than 3 days before net due date and with no discount) * 100

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	"6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" AS "Transaction code",
	COUNT("case_id") AS "# Cases",
	AVG(
			(SELECT LAST(end_time))
			-
			(SELECT FIRST(end_time)))
		AS "AVG cycle time",
        AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AP items cleared more than 3 days before net due date and with no discount") * 100
        	AS "Early payments (%)",
        AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AP items cleared after net due date") *100 
        	AS "Late payments (%)" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "6 - Other - Clearing Entry Date (CPUDT_AUGBL)" IS NOT NULL 
	AND "6 - Other - Reversed With (STBLG)" IS NULL

children.name: Ratio of custom transaction codes used for invoice clearing by company code

dataSource.query:
SELECT  "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes",
		"# Cases",
        "Company code"
    FROM
    (SELECT
		COUNT(case_id) as "# Cases", 
		COUNT( CASE WHEN 
    				"6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE 'Z%'
    				OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE 'Y%'
    				OR "6 - Other - Clearing TCode (TCODE_AUGBL)" LIKE '/%'
    				THEN case_id ELSE null END )
    			    /
    				COUNT(case_id) * 100 as "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes",
		"1 - Main - Company Code (BUKRS)" AS "Company code"
	
	FROM THIS_PROCESS
    ) AS temp
WHERE "Percentage of cases with custom transaction codes" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 2 DESC

parameter.name: 2 - Blocker - FI-AP items cleared more than 3 days before net due date and with no discount
2 - Blocker - FI-AP items cleared after net due date
3 - Info - Supplier invoices created for internal trading partners
2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices created after posting date
